title: The Emerald Empress Vaddanam - Diamond and Emerald Waist Belt
materials: Base metal is 22K Gold. Adorned with meticulously set Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds) and vibrant Zambian Emeralds. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This stunning Vaddanam boasts a geometric pattern across the band, completely studded with Polki diamonds. The central design is a complex floral arrangement featuring an oval-cut Emerald as its focal point, surrounded by diamond-studded motifs. Further embellishment comes in the form of carved emerald beads suspended from the lower edge and circular peacock design on each side. The setting style enhances the natural sparkle of the diamonds, reflecting light from every angle. Traditional Telugu design elements make it a classic heirloom piece.
occasions: especially for the Muhurtham ceremony. Suitable for grand occasions like weddings
and other traditional functions. Can also be styled with modern ethnic wear for a fusion look.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship with a traditional design that never goes out of style. The use of genuine Polki Diamonds and Zambian Emeralds adds significant value. The Emerald Empress Vaddanam is more than just jewelry; it's an investment and a symbol of elegance and tradition. The Hyderabadi polish ensures durability and lasting luster. The emerald beads promote health and prosperity.
